about_the_game:
TL;DR: You get a rainbow puking HergornTV emote on your progress bar. Not more, not less.

HergornTV

The HergornTV rainbow puking emote is the most excellent rainbow puking emote in existence and was masterfully crafted by JujiBla for HergornTV’s stream and this DLC.

Go on this magnificent experience, support your favorite UNKNOWN streamer and enjoy the rainbow puke.

what’s included 🌈

the HergonTV puke emote 🤮

a new image to view in the terminal 🖼️

a thank you message from us to you 💌

the option to enable/disable the logo ✅

the knowledge that you support us even more 💖

what’s NOT included 👎🦄

Unfortunately we haven’t found a way to add achievements to a DLC exclusively. To make sure that all the awesome folks out there who have bought the Progress Bar Simulator are able to 100% complete the achievements (whether or not they want to buy the DLC), we had to leave the achievements out.

We are really sorry that we aren’t able to give you additional HergornTV PREMIUM achievements at the current time :(

Anything else that is not explicitly listed as included is not included.

short_description: The ultimate addition to your progress bar experience: A Rainbow puking NONAME influencer. What else can you wish for?
